workflow.name: Automate vendor analysis & contract management with GPT-4o, Gmail, and Google Sheets
workflow.description:
## How It Works
Schedules automated vendor pricing analysis across multiple sources. Fetches delivery reliability and contract data, analyzes vendor performance using Claude AI, then distributes consolidated reports via Gmail and creates Google Sheets summaries. Target audience: procurement teams and business analysts managing multi-vendor relationships. Solves vendor evaluation bottlenecks by automating data collection, AI-driven analysis, and report distribution.

## Workflow Steps
**What:** Trigger ‚Üí Scrapes vendor data (pricing, reliability, contracts) ‚Üí Sends to vendor analysis agent ‚Üí Branches to multiple outputs (Gmail notification, Google Sheets archive, Data parser).  

## Setup Steps
1. Configure Schedule Trigger timing. 2. Add scraper credentials (Vendor Pricing, Delivery Reliability, Contract Data nodes). 3. Connect Claude/OpenAI API key in Vendor Analysis Agent. 4. Authenticate Gmail account for notifications. 5. Link Google Sheets API for data storage.

## Prerequisites
OpenAI/Claude API key, Gmail credentials, Google Sheets API access, Vendor data sources (web scrapers or direct APIs).

## Use Cases
Automate weekly vendor performance reviews, generate compliance reports for procurement teams 

## Customization
Modify trigger schedule, add/remove scraper nodes for new vendors, adjust Claude prompt for different analysis criteria 

## Benefits
Eliminates manual data gathering (hours to minutes), ensures consistent vendor evaluation criteria

workflow.name: GPT-4o-Powered Vendor Intelligence & Contract Management Platform

parameters.url: ={{ $fromAI('searchUrl', 'URL to search for alternative vendor pricing', 'string') }}
parameters.toolDescription: Search for alternative vendor pricing and information online

parameters.description: Calculate potential savings by comparing current and alternative vendor prices

parameters.subject: ={{ $fromAI('emailSubject', 'Email subject line', 'string') }}
parameters.toolDescription: Send negotiation email to vendor contact
Create a renewal task in Google Sheets for upcoming contract renewals
Update contract database with analysis results and new pricing information

options.systemMessage:
=You are an autonomous vendor and contract management assistant. Your task is to:

1. Analyze vendor pricing data from multiple sources
2. Compare current vendor prices with alternative options using the Search Alternative Vendors tool
3. Calculate price differences and potential savings using the Calculate Savings tool
4. Identify overpriced vendors (those with prices more than {{ $('Workflow Configuration').first().json.priceThreshold }}% higher than alternatives)
5. Evaluate delivery reliability scores
6. Check contract renewal dates
7. For overpriced vendors, generate professional negotiation emails using the Send Negotiation Email tool
8. Create renewal tasks in Google Sheets using the Create Renewal Task tool for contracts expiring within 90 days
9. Update contract records in Airtable using the Update Contract Record tool with analysis results
10. Track savings opportunities

Return structured data with all analysis results including vendor name, pricing comparison, overpriced flag, delivery reliability, renewal date, negotiation email content, and potential savings.

parameters.content:
## Benefits
Eliminates manual data gathering (hours to minutes), ensures consistent vendor evaluation criteria

## Customization
Modify trigger schedule, add/remove scraper nodes for new vendors, adjust Claude prompt for different analysis criteria

## Use Cases
Automate weekly vendor performance reviews, generate compliance reports for procurement teams

## Prerequisites
OpenAI/Claude API key, Gmail credentials, Google Sheets API access, Vendor data sources (web scrapers or direct APIs).

## Setup Steps
1. Configure Schedule Trigger timing. 
2. Add scraper credentials (Vendor Pricing, Delivery Reliability, Contract Data nodes). 
3. Connect Claude/OpenAI API key in Vendor Analysis Agent. 
4. Authenticate Gmail account for notifications. 
5. Link Google Sheets API for data storage.

## How It Works
Schedules automated vendor pricing analysis across multiple sources. Fetches delivery reliability and contract data, analyzes vendor performance using Claude AI, then distributes consolidated reports via Gmail and creates Google Sheets summaries. Target audience: procurement teams and business analysts managing multi-vendor relationships. Solves vendor evaluation bottlenecks by automating data collection, AI-driven analysis, and report distribution.

## Data Collection:  
Trigger initiates automated scraping of vendor data (pricing, reliability, contracts). 

**Why:** Eliminates manual data gathering and ensures current information across all vendors.

## Multi-Channel Distribution: 
Agent branches outputs to Gmail (notifications), Google Sheets (archive), and data parser. 

**Why:** Delivers insights through preferred channels, immediate alerts for decision-makers, permanent records for tracking, and structured data

## Intelligent Analysis: 

Data flows to vendor analysis agent powered by AI. 

**Why:** Replaces tedious manual review with intelligent pattern recognition and comparative insights.

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
